Company: University of Florida College of Dentistry
Description of incident: Some current and former dental              patients have been notified that an unauthorized intruder recently              accessed a College of Dentistry computer server storing their personal              information. College information technology staff members were upgrading              the server and found software had been installed on it remotely. Information              stored on the server included names, addresses, birth dates, Social              Security numbers and, in some cases, dental procedure information              for patients dating back to 1990.
